data.title: Stipendium Hungaricum
data.text:
Sending Partners and Available Study Programmes

The programme is based on bilateral educational cooperation agreements signed between the Ministries responsible for education in the sending countries/territories and Hungary or between institutions. Currently nearly 90 Sending Partners are engaged in the programme on 5 different continents, and the geographical scope of the programme is spreading each year.

Applicants are eligible to apply for scholarship types and study fields determined in the educational cooperation programmes in effect between Hungary and the specific Sending Partner.

In order to apply students must send the application to: becascooperacion@gmail.com in two PDF documents:

1 PDF: The downloaded application made on the Dream Apply System

1 PDF: The two documents requested by Senescyt (Senescyt application form and the academic record)

The Sending Partner does not receive hard copies.

It is necessary to pay attention to the deadline stablished by the sending partner. Any incomplete application will be rejected, no extemporaneous documents are accepted.

All the information about the Scholarship will be published on: https://siau.senescyt.gob.ec/convocatorias/

Applications are submitted via electronic application system - https://app.iec.gov.ge/. The applicant creates an individual electronic application, uploads all required documents and submits the application before the deadline, the applicant can edit the application before the expiration of the deadline and also complete the application step by step. The updated application must be submitted again. Tempus and the International Education Center (IEC) have deadlines at the same time.

Applicants from Indonesia do not need to submit a separate application to the Sending Parner, they only need to apply through DreamApply. • announcement regarding Stipendium Hungaricum is available at www.dikti.kemdikbud.go.id , Minimum English language competency score is 6.5 of IELTS (or equivalent), Applicants who are permanent lecturers need to have two additional requirements: o Letter of Permission from Home University, o NIDN (Lecturer's National Identity Number)”

Further information about the application to the Sending Partner:

Please note that Japanese applicants do not need to submit a separate application package to the Japanese partner country.

Besides the academic excellence, we are recruiting Japanese youths capable to play an active role in the international community to bridge our countries in the future.

Applicants have to submit their application to the Ministry of Education and Higher Education by email to scholarship@mehe.gov.lb at the same time as they apply through Tempus Public Foundation’s application portal. The deadline of application to the Sending Partner: 20 January 2024.

The deadline of applications for MOHE: subject to the deadline of the Stipendium Hungaricum 2023/2024 programme , The channel(s) used for announcements by MOHE : MOHE’s official website at www.mohe.gov.my, The process of application to MOHE: to send a copy of the completed online application to international@mohe.gov.my

Name of responsible authority:

Chile: Agencia Chilena de Cooperación Internacional para el Desarrollo (AGCID)

Colombia: Instituto Colombiano de Crédito Educativo y Estudios Técnicos en el Exterior (ICETEX)

México: Agencia Mexicana de Cooperación Internacional para el Desarrollo (AMEXCID) – Dirección de Intercambio Académico

Peru: Programa Nacional de Becas y Crédito Educativo (PRONABEC)

Name of responsible person and e-mail addresses:

Peru: https://www.gob.pe/pronabec

https://www.pronabec.gob.pe/becas-de-otros-paises/

Postal address:

Colombia: Carrera 3 #18-32 Bogotá, Colombia. Código postal: 110321

Mexico: Plaza Juárez 20, Planta Baja. Colonia Centro, Alcaldía Cuauhtémoc. Ciudad de México. C.P. 06010

Peru: Av. Arequipa 1935 Lince – Lima -Perú

Telephone:

Chile: 56 8 2827 5700

Colombia: +(57) 1 417-3535

Mexico: +(55) 3686 - 5100 ext: 5278/ ext: 6633

Peru: 080 00 00 18 or (01) 612 82 30

Applicants are mandatorily required to submit online applications at both Hungarian website (https://stipendiumhungaricum.hu/apply/) and Higher Education Commission (HEC) of Pakistan website (http://scholarship.hec.gov.pk/). Since HEC nominates candidates based on written test, applicants are required to register for written test (https://etc.hec.gov.pk). Deadline of application is same as Hungarian side.

Deadline of application at the Commission on Higher Education: January 2024 (one week after the TPF portal deadline). The call for applications will be issued in October/November 2023. The Commission on Higher Education (CHED), Republic of the Philippines will issue to: 1. CHED Central and Regional Offices, 2. Philippine Higher Education Institutions, 3. Philippines Government Agencies. Dissemination of information in CHED hosted events ,Invitations will be uploaded in CHED website and social media i.e. Facebook, Additional requirements: Selection: Application documents shall initially be evaluated. Qualified nominees will be invited to a panel interview by the CHED Scholarship Screening Committee (SCC). Schedule of panel interview: January/February 2024 (Nominees are advised to contact the CHED-IAS at telephone number (63-2) 8441-0750 or email stipendium@ched.gov.ph for confirmation of the schedule for interview.

Application through universities and scientific organizations of Russian Federations to the Federal State Budgetary Institution „Centre of Education Development and Inernational Activities (FSBI „Interobrazivanie”) by email: mobility@ined.ru

Deadline to the Sending partner: 15-19th January 2024 (based on the appropriate decision of Tempus Public Foundation)

For the year 2023, the deadline for students to express their interest in applying for a scholarship abroad is September 22nd of this year.

Application deadline to Partner is the same as to Tempus Public Foundation. Applicants are requested to submit an academic transcript, passport or ID copies, certificates, and motivation letters. Please also include the implementing partners as follows: Ms Linda Peter: Assistant Director peter.l@dhet.gov.za, internationalscholarships@dhet.gov.za

The applicants are required to submit their online applications to the online portal of the ministry. The deadline for application to the ministry is the same as the deadline set by TPF

The deadline of application: As stated in the scholarship portal, The channel(s) used for announcement by the sending partner: the Call for Applications and result announcement will be disseminated through https://www.mhesi.go.th

Turkish applicants have to apply to the Sending Partner as well.

The Ministry of National Education's website, basvuru.meb.gov.tr, allows applicants to submit applications online.

The announcement can be found here: https://abdigm.meb.gov.tr/www/macaristan-hukumet-bursu-2024-2025/icerik/2040
